item.description: Hiker Rescue; INC#0516; 09:34AM; 20731 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ope1cJ; Woodland Hills; LAFD ground and air response to a critically injured 29 year-old male mountain bicyclist near a remote trail in rugged terrain south of Serrania Park. A hovering LAFD rescue helicopter lowered flight paramedics to medically assess and stabilize the patient, and have been joined by LAFD ground crews to carefully prepare the patient to be hoisted into the hovering helicopter for continued in-flight care during direct transport to a regional trauma center.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AO2 BC17 E290 E305 E72 E84 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA83 RH114 T105 T90; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0377; 08:21AM; 1809 E 42nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3seaTBr; #CentralAlameda; 43 LAFD Firefighters took just 24 minutes in an offensive firefight to hold flames to the well involved rear portion of a 1,000 square-foot residential duplex, preventing fire spread to nearby residential and industrial structures. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District outside city; BC1 BC13 E14 E15 E209 E215 E221 E233 RA17 RA246 SQ21 T21 T33 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0377; 07:57AM; 1809 E 42nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3seaTBr; #CentralAlameda; PRELIM: Fire to the rear of a 1,000 square-foot one-story home.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District outside city; BC1 BC13 E14 E15 E209 E215 E221 E233 RA17 RA246 SQ21 T21 T33 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

#Contained - Brush Fire; INC#0322; 08:00AM; 7400 W Verdugo Crestline Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gn5XiH; #Tujunga; The well-coordinated ground and air response from LAFD and allied agencies held and has now fully contained the flames of a rubbish/debris fire to a one 1/8th (one-eighth) acre hilltop in LAFD jurisdiction, before the fire could be spread by light wind into nearby medium density brush. No injury. No structure damage. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 CW3A E24 E290 E298 E42 E60 E7 E77 E89 EM5 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA74 RA90 T90 T98 WT77 + LACoFD and Angeles NF in Automatic Aid; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0322; 07:08AM; 7400 W Verdugo Crestline Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gn5XiH; Tujunga; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with jurisdictionally adjacent LACoFD and Angeles NF (Automatic Aid Response - Mutual Threat Zone) to a 1/8th (one-eighth) acre debris pile burning in light brush on a remote (difficult to access by ground) mountain ridge in light wind conditions. At this time only identified threat is adjacent medium density brush.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 CW3A E24 E290 E298 E42 E60 E7 E77 E89 EM5 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA74 RA90 T90 T98 WT77 + LACoFD and Angeles NF in Automatic Aid; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0186; 04:57AM; 1310 S Wall St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HoYNeZ; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN Firefighters made entry into the commercial building, reaching the seat of the fire and extinguished it in one hour and two minutes with no injuries reported. The commercial building is a strip mall and firefighters contained the fire to the corner unit (DBA a uniform supply store). They attacked the bulk of the fire on the ground floor and then transitioned to the remaining fire in the mezzanine and deep into the corner of the business. Traffic will be impacted through the morning as crews will remain on scene conducting overhaul operations. Over 80 firefighters were assigned to the incident. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E3 E9 EM11 HR3 RA209 RA3 RA803 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0186; 03:55AM; 1310 S Wall St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HoYNeZ; Downtown; An outside fire extended into an approximately 150 x 150 two story commercial building. Additional resources were added. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E3 E9 EM11 HR3 RA209 RA3 RA803 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1632; 09:32PM; 1851 S Grand Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/35yWtEf; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 33 firefighters located a well-established kitchen fire on the first floor of the college and extinguished it in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. Smoke needs to be cleared from the building and firefighters are working on ventilating the structure. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 RA10 RA810 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1632; 09:08PM; 1851 S Grand Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/35yWtEf; Downtown; Four story, college building (LA Trade Technical College) with smoke showing - preliminary reports of a possible kitchen fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 RA10 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0933; 02:02PM; 657 E 87th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L73X1y; Green Meadows; KNOCKDOWN: 29 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the detached garage. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA246 RA857 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
